summary: Version 1.2. Added Alternate and Original Versions. A redux of the Ebony Mail that adds custom pauldrons. Male Version Only.
descriptionHtml:
Ebony Mail Pauldrons v1.2 by EndgameV
..........................................................................................................................................
As my first mod on the nexus i present the Ebony Mail Pauldrons.

What this mod does is add pauldrons to the Ebony Mail since I didn\'t like how bare my shoulders were on the vanilla. This combines the pauldrons from Vanilla Ebony with the Ebony Mail and simply tweaked them till they worked (and looked awesome.)

Currently only available for Male Vanilla Body as that\'s what I use, but I have no idea if that\'ll change in the future.

:EDIT:

Now added an Alternate version of the pauldrons if the first isn\'t your style. Also added an Original version which is just the vanilla ebony pauldrons attached.

Still only for Male Vanilla Body but I will be working on adding female versions in the coming weeks.

Installation:
Mod Manager:
Just click \'Download With Manager\' and install

Manually:
Just extract everything to your Data/Meshes/Armor/ebonymail directory

Changelog:
v1.0 - Uploaded to the Nexus for the first time.

v1.2 - Added Alternate and Original Versions

Credits:
- Bethesda Softworks for the original meshes and a legendary game.

- Nightasy here on the nexus for his awesome tutorials that helped me build this.
author: EndgameV
